user_description.ru: Он говорит тебе «хорошая девочка», «умница», «какая ты красивая».
user_description.en: He tells you "good girl", "clever girl", "you're so beautiful".

ai_description.ru: 'Хорошая девочка', — шепчет он ей на ухо. Она тает от его слов.
ai_description.en: 'Good girl,' he whispers in her ear. She melts from his words. Praise as reward, approval as arousal.

image_prompt: man stroking woman's face, woman nude looking up at him, man shirtless, bedroom setting
